CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 12, 1961, page A4, reads: "Honor Agency Director - Local employees of the North Carolina Mutual Life Insurance Company gather around as Harry Shepard, leading agent for the Pittsburgh District, presents the insurance sales scroll to W. A. Clement, that company's new agency director. This was Mr. Clement's first visit to the district since taking over the post. Other salesmen, besides Sheppard, who made outstanding records in the recent sales program were: Mrs. Odile Posey Bennett, Richard Robinson, C. Burleigh and Mrs. Gladys Haines. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five women, and thirteen men, employees of the North Caroline Mutual Life Insurance Company, including Harry Shepard wearing striped jacket, holding scroll and shaking hands with W. A. Clement, gathered in interior with chalkboard chart and TWA poster
